INSIDE THE ARK:

> Hydras did a final shot and send a secret message to Nig=
htrazor "The door
is open, time to leave"and said in loud voice "PREDACONS.=
.. RETREAT!!!!"
> Hydras picked up inferno and started to leave the area

>=
 [Tuscon=92s] eyes narrow dangerously.
>
> "THAT'S IT! I'VE HAD ENOUGH!"
>
=
> He senses where Megatron's body was laying down, and slams his foot on hi=
s
chest, pointing an arrow straight for it!
>
> " HYDRAS, NIGHTRAZOR, CYCLO=
NUS, SCOURGE! IF YOU ARE WITHIN RANGE OF MY
COMMUNICATIONS HEAR THIS! YOU D=
ARE TO HARM MY FELLOW MAXIMALS AND AUTOBOTS,
AND THREATEN TO TAKE THEIR LIV=
ES! WELL, I HAVE NEWS FOR YOU TOO! YOU'VE LEFT
ME NO CHOICE BUT TO DO THE S=
AME TO YOU AS WELL! I HAVE MEGATRON'S BODY UNDER
MY FOOT, AND AN ARROW STRA=
IGHT FOR HIS CHEST CHAMBER! YOU STEP FOOT ANY
FURTHER INTO MY ARK, TAKE ANO=
THER AUTOBOT OR MAXIMAL AND I SWEAR I'LL BE
SURE HE NEVER WAKES UP! PERIOD!=
"
>
> His voice echoes throught the Ark. With each word he rattles the Ark,=

voice booming like that of an angry lion. He was sick of the Predacons and=

Decepticon's attack on his Ark, and he holds his position over Megatron an=
d
awaits their response before doing anything to anyone. Yet, the arrow
rem=
ains pointed for a perfect shot to the fallen Megatron's chest!
>
> He then=
 turns his head to Rodimus.
>
> " I want you to know you have full permissi=
on to permanently disable any
predacons or Decepticons you see fit. Scour t=
he parameters of the Ark, and
be sure no one gets in, Rodimus. I'll handle =
Nightrazor in here."

<NEW>

Rodimus looked at Tuscon, a look of complete s=
urprise on his face, =93What are
you doing?=94 he said as he looked at Tusc=
on and then at the weapon that was
being pointed at Megatron.

=93Tuscon, H=
ydras is already retreating! LOOK!=94 he said, pointing at Hydras
who had p=
icked up his fallen teammate and was already moving out of the Ark.


At th=
is same time Legacy also stepped into the room, coming from one of the
back=
 corridors into the front. As a guardian, it was his job, his internal
dire=
ctive to keep the Ark and all of its occupants safe, an imperative that
wou=
ld also include even the Decepticons that were to wake up several million
y=
ears later.

Legacy=92s single optic pulsed as he took in the scene, Hydras=
 leaving and
Tuscon pointing a weapon at Megatron to ensure that he did so.=


=93NONE OF THE ARK=92S OCCUPANTS ARE TO COME TO HARM.=94 Legacy said, fal=
ling into
his old coldly logical voice. His voice sounded nothing if not mo=
re formal,
his tones frigid, his words clear as crystal, and his stance fir=
m and
resolved. Legacy pointedly glanced at Straight Shot and then back at =
Tuscon,
=93TO PUT OUR FUTURE IN JEOPARDY TO RESOLVE THIS ISSUE IS NOT ACCEP=
TABLE.=94

> <OLD>
>
> PErceptor gain control of the ark and activate all t=
he internal defences
against the Hydra's predacons and tried to

<NEW>

As =
preceptor worked, the Ark began to respond to his commands as weapons
began=
 to activate, internal defenses systems came online.

=93What is your comma=
nd?=94 Teletran 1 asked Perceptor.


MEANWHILE IN THE MEDICAL BAY:

> <OLD>=

>
> Nightlight continue peacefully sleeping while Elita jumped on the bed =
in
her beast form and nuzzled in her mom's cheek while she cried in silence=
.
> "Mommie"said Elita" I miss you so much... so much"sobbed the little gir=
l
while her tears fell in her mom's cheek

<NEW>

Nightlight continued to s=
leep, as all around her the machines registered her
as resting in a comma l=
ike state. All of her systems seemed otherwise in
stable condition.

Ramulu=
s looked at Nightlight and Elita, a soft look on his face.

Then Tuscon=92s=
 voice boomed through, threatening the Predacons. =93SLAG!=94
Ramulus said =
as he glanced back at Elita, =93You stay here.=94 Ramulus said.
=93I=92m go=
ing to lock you in and then go see if anything can be done for our
medical =
staff.=94

Ramulus spoke as he quickly gathered up a few med packs and a sc=
anner.
=93Danged daft Predacons, causing so much damage.=94 Ramulus grumble=
d under his
breath. Ramulus was no medic, but he did know a bit about first=
 aid. Perhaps
there was something he could so for Santon and Bump who were =
still lying on
the floor of the corridors. Perhaps they were not as . . . h=
urt as they
looked. He couldn=92t even bring himself to think of them as de=
ad.

With a last look at Elita he left. The door clicked as he locked it an=
d then
the room that Elita was in went silent except for the computer monit=
ors that
were watching over Nightlight.

For the moment all was peaceful in=
 the medbay.

However outside the Ark was a very different matter!

> <OLD>=

>
> Windlord and Kup keep their fire against Scourge and Deepstrike

<NEW>=


As the firefight continues Deepstryke took a hit, as did Scourge, forcing=

them to break off their attack on the door and swing up into the air to
av=
oid any further and more critical damage. Several more of the sweeps were
b=
lasted from the skies, the last one swinging up next to his master Scourge,=

almost as if for protection.

The Predacons were looking decidedly more da=
maged and a bit more tired then
before. Energon looked to be looking a bit =
lower than before and the shots
from Windlord and Kup were building up on t=
hem, not to mention the firepower
coming from the fuzors as well as Leo II!=
 Yes, the Predacons had breached
the door, but getting further in would be =
an uphill battle indeed, and many
of them did not look to be in the best sh=
ape to fight it!

> <OLD>
>
> Meanwhile, Outside, Quickstride quickly gets =
Uproar to his feet, and
assesses the situation. He then looks around the pa=
rameters and then
remembers a body of goop, that resembled a tar pit, not f=
ar from the Ark's
parameters. Uproar looks to him.

*<SNIP/CUT/PASTE>*

>
>=
 Uproar and Quickstride now approach Deep Stryke and the others with their
=
hands up in submission. Quickstride is the first to approach them.

<NEW>

=
Deepstryke hovered in the air as he noticed the two walked towards him, his=

cannons swiveling to track them when they spoke . . .

> <OLD>
>
> "Okay, =
okay, you got us, you got us. Why don't we just show you guys an
easy way i=
nta the ark hmm? That way we all get what we want and everyone's
happy."

<=
NEW>

=93You, a Maximal would show a Predacon a way into his own fortress?=
=94
Deepstryke said, obviously not believing the two for a moment, and yet =
he
didn=92t shoot at them either. Perhaps there was a part of him that WANT=
ED to
believe it. Then Hydras=92 call went out to retreat!

=93Blast you Ma=
ximal!=94 Deepstryke said as he began to pull back. =93NEXT TIME we
will br=
each your walls and TAKE what we want!=94

The Predacons began to back up, =
moving into the air, slowly moving away from
the Ark, even as the Ark=92s c=
annons and weaponry began to move and come
online.

(TAG)

Preston
